alert.note: Alert for Lake (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 14 at 11:15AM EST until January 17 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills occurring. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...In Illinois, Southern Cook County. In Indiana, Lake IN County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon CST today. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 9 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 15 to 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
